channel.title: How do I make portals for members only?
channel.description:
Hi there. I wanted to know how to I make portal for members only. I've looked for some tutorials, but none fit my case.
Thanks in advance :D

item.title: How do I make portals for members only?
item.dc:creator: @megaxx megaxx
item.description:
@megaxx wrote:

I declare this:

public boolean member() { if(member == 0) return false; else return true; }

And this is the command:

[code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“membercommand”) && member == 0) {
addItem(ITEMID, Amount);

        sendMessage("Anything here");
}[/code]

By the way, in the code above, the portal doesnt have coordinates to say where will it be? =/
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 07, 2009, 04:35:00 pm[/size][hr]And I get this error:

client.java:38: cannot find symbol symbol : variable member location: class client if(member == 0) ^ client.java:13124: cannot find symbol symbol : variable member location: class client if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("memberzone") && member == 0) { ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make portals for members only?

item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

[quote=“megaxx, post:9, topic:271671”]Do I have to do anything else like declaring variables?
If so please tell me how because everytime I try to declare a variable, it gives me errors compiling…

Thanks! :D[/quote]

Well then, what are you declaring and what are the errors?

item.title: How do I make portals for members only?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“dbagmandk, post:7, topic:271671”]Well if your using Delta it would be
if(objectID == 6551) && (donator == 1) {
toX = ####;
toY = ####;
sM(“You teleport to the members area.”);
} else {
sM(“You must be a member to use this portal”);
}

:S… Owned…[/quote]
That’s exactly what I just posted…

Read full topic

item.title: How do I make portals for members only?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Wolf’s code would give you errors.
Try this -

if(objectID == 6551) && (member == 1) { toX = ####; toY = ####; sM("You teleport to the members area."); } else { sM("You must be a member to use this portal"); }

Read full topic

item.title: How do I make portals for members only?
item.dc:creator: @wolfs_goal wolfs goal
item.description:
@wolfs_goal wrote:

if((objectID == 6551) && (absX == 3088) && (absY == 3500) && member == 1){
triggertele(absX, absY, heightLevel);
sM("You teleport to the members area.");
} else
sM("You must be a member to use this portal");
}
}

there you go mate.

Read full topic
